messages.text: Hello! How are you doing today?

I have been feeling very bad the last couple of days. My bowel movements have been all over the place, and I have had intense diarrhea. My stomach has been hurting very bad as well, and I sometimes find myself nauseous and vomiting.
I am sorry about that. Is your diarrhea accompanied with blood?
Have you been in contact with anyone sick within the past 14 days?
I met up with someone who got the common cold a few days ago, but they had completely different symptoms compared to what I have right now.
Have you had any food that expired or tasted odd within the last week?
I had undercooked meat 2 days ago that made me feel very bad after eating it.
Did you check your temperature recently?
I measured yesterday and it was about 99 degrees fahrenheit.
Based on what you said, you likely have viral gastroenteritis, otherwise known as the stomach flu.
